newsitem.title: USA: National TechTeam files for share offer.
newsitem.headline: National TechTeam files for share offer.

text.p: National TechTeam Inc filed Friday with the Securities and Exchange Comission for up to three million common shares.

The Dearborn, Mich., company said the proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes, including domestic and international call center expansion, capital expenditures, working capital and acquisitions.
The offering will be made through Salomon Brothers and Robert W. Baird & Co Inc. The underwriters have an over-allotment option for up to 450,000 common shares.
